item.title: Chaor, The Fierce
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 65 0         80 105 45 45 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 9'Weight 1175 lbsEyes Pine Green Skin Dark Steel-grey Bright red, Orange & Sunflower Yellow (flames) Loyalty UnderWorlders Enemies M'arrillians Lord van Bloot   Exiled from the UnderWorld, Chaor has lost his homeland and his throne.

item.title: Glacier Plains, M’arrillian Melting Camp
item.description: M’arrillian Melting Camp Region OverWorld Rarity Ultra Rare Initiative Fluidmorpher   In order to accomplish their goal of flooding all of Perim, making a big ocean out of it, the M’arrillians settled down a camp so they could build the heat cannon to melt the ice mountains. The Mugical aura of the Glacier Plains feels this disturbance and unless a sacrifice is paid, in the form of Mugicians, the trespassers will be severally penalized by having all of their Attributes cut-off by 50 points each.

item.title: Malvadine, The King's Herald

item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 55 0         110 55 80 45 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 9'4"Weight 322 lbsEyes Hazel Hair Black & White Skin Green Violet (markings) Preferred Battlegear Xerium Armor Enemies M'arrillians   I don't just fight for the OverWorld!

item.title: Najarin, Fluidmorphers' Foe
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 25 3         30 35 70 45 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 8'6"Weight 225 lbsEyes Azure Blue Hair Light Platinum-Gray Skin Light Teal-Blue Loyalty OverWorlders Preferred Locations Najarin's Castle Kiru City Enemies M'arrillians   In the Animation, during the M’arrillian Invasion, really powerful Creatures entered the fray, some with much stronger innate abilities than most of the Creatures of any other Tribe.

item.title: Najarin, High Muge of the Lake
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 35 2         60 30 100 30 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 8'6"Weight 225 lbsEyes Azure Blue Hair Light Platinum-Gray Skin Light Teal-Blue Loyalty OverWorlders Preferred Locations Najarin's Castle Kaizeph, the City of Elements   After all the marvels I've seen him perform, I still don't know the limits of Najarin's power.

item.title: Takinom, the Shadowknight
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 65 1         50 90 40 70 Elements         Biography Gender FemaleHeight 8'10"Weight 268 lbsEyes Reddish-orange Hair Dark Copper-auburn Skin Light Golden-yellow Dark Green (markings) Loyalty UnderWorlders Enemies M'arrillians   In the Animation, during the M’arrillian Invasion, Takinom becomes even more committed to her Tribe and, enraged with the M’arrillians’ ideals, comes into play the unique Shadowknight, a much more powerful, resilient and swifter Creature, regardless the heavy weight of the new full-body armour, with a different set skills and abilities.

item.title: Tartarek, Psi-Overloader
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 65 2         90 40 110 55 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 5'6"Weight 271 lbsEyes Midnight Green Hair Pavlova Beige Skin Coco-Milk (body) Tussock Yellow (shell) Loyalty M'arrillians Preferred Locations Kiru City Preferred Battlegear Reefshard   In the Animation, when the events of the M’arrillian Invasion effectively began, Phelphor mind-controls the Guardians of the Deepmines, Vinta, Junda, Nauthilax and Tartarek, so they could open the Doors of the Deepmines.
